com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.testing
[Groovy] Class UnitDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.openqa.selenium.htmlunit.HtmlUnitDriver
      com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.testing.UnitDriver

final class UnitDriver
extends HtmlUnitDriver

A specific version of the HTML Unit Driver that will store an exception for later use.

Property Summary
static java.lang.String TIMEOUT_PREFIX

Used to define the error to the user when there is a timeout.
java.lang.Exception exception

A variable for storing the first exception encountered.
 
Constructor Summary
UnitDriver(boolean enableJavascript)

The default constructor, which just calls the HTMLUnitDriver constructor.
 
Method Summary
protected WebClient modifyWebClient(WebClient client)

Override the default behavior of the unit driver to provide credentials or alternate behaviors.
